meanings.definition: In the time following a particular event or date.
meanings.sent1: She has been happy since the party.
meanings.sent2: I have been waiting for you since morning.
meanings.sent3: Since the concert, he has been humming the tunes.
meanings.sent4: Her smile has been bright since the good news.
meanings.sent5: The flowers have bloomed beautifully since the rain.

meanings.sent1: He couldn't sleep well since he drank coffee late.
meanings.sent2: She is tired since she worked all day.
meanings.sent3: Since the dog barked, the cat ran away.
meanings.sent4: The road was closed since the storm hit.
meanings.sent5: Since the alarm rang, everyone woke up in a hurry.

meanings.sent1: He has been my friend since kindergarten.
meanings.sent2: She has been practicing piano since she was five.
meanings.sent3: Since the movie started, I couldn't stop laughing.
meanings.sent4: The tree has been growing since it was planted.
meanings.sent5: Since the book was published, it has been popular.
